hero.trustBanner: Your trusted partner for business setup in the UAE
hero.title: From idea to reality, your business starts with
hero.description: Company formation, legal licenses, investor visas – all in one place

services.sectionDescription: We provide a comprehensive suite of services to meet all your business needs in the UAE

economicDept.title: DED Services
economicDept.description: Company formation and trade license processing

visas.title: Visa Services
visas.description: Issue and renewal of all types of visas (tourist, work, family)

rent.title: Tenancy Services
rent.description: Certification and renewal of tenancy contracts as per official regulations

emiratesId.title: Emirates ID Services
emiratesId.description: Quick and easy issuance and renewal of Emirates ID

residency.title: Residency Services
residency.description: Procedures for issuing and renewing all types of residencies

legal.title: Legal & Licensing
legal.description: Official licensing and commercial contract processing

mohre.title: MOHRE Services
mohre.description: Transactions with the Ministry of Human Resources & Emiratisation

gdrfa.title: GDRFA Services
gdrfa.description: Quick and accurate immigration and residency transactions

personalInsurance.title: Individual & Staff Insurance
personalInsurance.description: Approved health insurance for individuals and employees

projectInsurance.title: Business & Project Insurance
projectInsurance.description: Protection for projects, buildings, and construction sites

translation.title: Document Attestation & Translation
translation.description: Certified legal document attestation and translation

notary.title: Notary Services
notary.description: Official authentication of contracts and transactions

about.sectionDescription: We are a specialized company offering integrated business solutions in the UAE. We help entrepreneurs and investors achieve their goals with confidence and ease.

box1.title: +15 Years of Experience
box1.description: We have deep experience in the UAE market and a full understanding of legal requirements.

box2.title: Professional Team
box2.description: Our specialized team provides customized solutions tailored to each client's needs.

box3.title: Full Reliability
box3.description: We adhere to the highest standards of quality and transparency in all our services.

testimonials.sectionDescription: We take pride in our clients’ trust and always strive to deliver the best services

items.name: Ahmed Mohamed
items.content: Excellent and fast service. They helped me set up my company professionally

items.name: Sarah Ali
items.content: Professional and helpful team. I highly recommend them

items.content: They made everything easy and I got my license in record time
